name: Samurai Stalemate Standoff
description:
A fighting game where you try to get a highscore by dragging out the fight as long as possible.

Controls

  • E: Attack (hold to charge attack)
  • R: Block

Rules

The game ends when you fall off the stage. You control the samurai the arrow points at. When you defeat your enemy you switch control to him. You are being pushed back! Don't fall off the stage!

Points:

  • 100: Defeat the enemy
  • 200: Get defeated
  • 300: Get hit by a falling rock

Story

Two samurais, enemies through fate, have reached their final standoff. Their final battle brought them to a vulcano. It is only a matter of time until they both fall to their doom. But before that, they are set to settle their decade long dispute.
